ISSUE.TITLE: Change the spelling of the Kiev to Kyiv in the settings timezone picker
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The timezone picker shows a russian version of spelling "Kiev" and should be "Kyiv" to be more like Ukrainian spelling of Київ. Screenshot of the Admin UI's `/settings/general` screen: ![Image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/675397/230929662-3d8fade0-9bae-4198-a9b0-acc27c8134ba.png) A [similar issue in momenjs](https://github.com/moment/moment/issues/6008). We need to investigate first, which library the Admin UI is using to fetch the timezone data into the dropdown.
